toVisit: To visit the product page please click the link below:
resetPasswordText: You are receiving this email because you requested a password reset for your account. To reset your password, please click the link below:
verifyEmailText: You are receiving this email because you requested to verify your email address. To verify your email address, please click the link below:
orderPlaced: Your order has been placed successfully!
orderPlacedDesc: Thank you for your order! We will process it as soon as possible. You can track your order status in your account.
success: We have looked throughout your application and we are happy to inform you that your store has been created successfully! You can now start selling your products.
rejected: We are sorry to inform you that your store has been rejected.
